http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/380942'Amanah won’t win a single seat in Kelantan'N Faizal Ghazali     2 May 2017The son-in-law of the late PAS spiritual leader Nik Abdul Aziz Nik Mat is certain that Parti Amanah Negara (Amanah) will not be able to win a single seat in Kelantan.Abdul Ariffahmi Abd Rahman, who is Machang PAS information chief, also believes that PAS would retain control of the East Coast state in the next general election.As for outside of Kelantan, Ariffahmi said Amanah, which is a splinter of PAS, would have to depend on DAP...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
